title: Joe Millionaire: What do Women Really Want? Love or Money?
itunes:title: Joe Millionaire: What do Women Really Want? Love or Money?
itunes:subtitle: What's so wrong with being a gold digger? Or rather a "gold finder"?
description:
We're back!!! After a short hiatus of our regularly scheduled content, we're back with even more basic bitch topics to intellectualize. We decided to come back strong with 4 top headlines for our Basic Bitch Quickies this week:

  • All these deaths in 2022 (Betty White, Sidney Poutier, and Bob Saget)
  • MGK & Megan Fox are Engaged
  • Jason Momoa and Lisa Bonnet Split
  • Drake Accused of Putting Hot Sauce in Condom After Sex


And to top it all off, we're reviewing Fox's reboot of the show, Joe Millionaire. We talk contestants, debate on which of the men are cuter(Kurt or Steven) and discuss what's more important when looking for a partner: love or money? What's so wrong with being a gold digger (or rather "gold finder")? And did you know there's a mathematical model to simulate which types of gifts you should buy to avoid being taken advantage of a "gold digger"?


Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com






Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
